edu.thu.keg.mdap

Class DataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.thu.keg.mdap.DataSet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeographicalDataSet, StatisticsDataSet

    public abstract class DataSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    myc Stands for a dataset hosted in the platform.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataSet() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract DataField[] getDataFields()
      Get an array of the fields contained in the dataset
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name (unique identifier) of the dataset, like a table name in SQL or HIVE.
      java.lang.String getQueryStatement()
      get query statement for querying data in the dataset.
      java.sql.ResultSet getResultSet()
      Return a disconnected in-memroy JDBC ResultSet containing the records of this dataset, if it is loadable The default implementation uses HIVE.
      abstract boolean isLoadable()
      Whether this dataset is small enough to be loaded into memory

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataSet

        public DataSet()

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name (unique identifier) of the dataset, like a table name in SQL or HIVE.
        Returns:
        the unique name. Default implementation is returning the class name. Subclass can override this.

      • getQueryStatement

        public java.lang.String getQueryStatement()
        get query statement for querying data in the dataset. The statement would be executed against the data provider.
        Returns:

      • getResultSet

        public java.sql.ResultSet getResultSet()
                                throws javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException
        Return a disconnected in-memroy JDBC ResultSet containing the records of this dataset, if it is loadable The default implementation uses HIVE.
        Returns:
        a JDBC ResultSet. The ResultSet is generated when the method is called for the first time
        Throws:
        javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException - when dataset is not loadable

      • isLoadable

        public abstract boolean isLoadable()
        Whether this dataset is small enough to be loaded into memory
        Returns:

      • getDataFields

        public abstract DataField[] getDataFields()
        Get an array of the fields contained in the dataset
        Returns:
